data.title: Lacelle and Prevost
data.meta_description: Lacelle: JEAN BAPTISTE LASCELLE-1. He was born Abt. 1832 in... Read more on Genealogy.com!
data.text:
JEAN BAPTISTE LASCELLE-1. He was born Abt. 1832 in Unknown location and parents unknown. He died between Feb 1863 and Sep 1864. Jean Baptiste married Marie Victoire Prevost sometime before the 30th July 1857 place unknown.

Notes for Jean Baptiste Lascelle:

1) name shows as Baptiste Lascelle as per Edward’s death registration

2) name as Jean Baptiste Lascelle - deceased - as per marriage record for Joseph June 7, 1880

3) name as Baptiste Laselle in Church marriage record for Edward and shows he is deceased

4) name shows as Baptiste Lassalle for baptismal record for Joseph (9 Aug 1857)

5) birthplace unknown as per death registration for Edward

MARIE VICTOIRE PREVOST. She was born Abt. 1839 in Quebec and parents unknown. She died between June 1880 and March 1916. Also Known As Marie Prevost.

Notes for Marie Victoire Prevost:

1) Victoire Prevost living as per marriage record for Joseph June 7, 1880

2) Name as Victoire Prevost born in Quebec as per Edwards’s death registration

3) Name as Marie Prevost in baptismal record for Joseph

4) WWl Attestation Paper for Joseph says mother and father are both deceased (24 Aug 1916)

5) Victoire married Moise Labrosse-dit-Raymond 29 sept 1864 St Francois-de-Sales Pte Gatineau Que. Moise was the son of Joachim Labrosse and Marie-Louise Brunet of Deux Montagnes County Que.

Jean Baptiste and Victoire had two children:

1) JOSEPH LASCELLE. He was born on 30 Jul 1857 in Aylmer Que He was baptised on 09 Aug 1857 in St Paul’s Church Aylmer Que. Godparents were Louis Dubois and Denise Sauve. He married Marie Josephine Brunette on 07 Jun 1880 in St John Chrysostom Church

Arnprior Ont Ottawa Ont (Diocese) daughter of Edouard Brunet and Josephine Joannisse. He died on 11 Feb 1945 in Arnprior Ont and was buried on 13 Feb 1945 in Malloch Cemetery Arnprior Ont (location f-5-10). Joseph and Josephine had 10 children.

2) EDOUARD LASCELLE. He was born on 05 Nov 1863 in Aylmer, Quebec and died on 15 July 1927 at the General Hospital Ottawa Ont and his burial was on 16 Jul 1927 in Arnprior Ont. Cause of Death was myocarditis (type of viral heart disease).

He married 1) Celina Chevrieux daughter of Joseph Chevrieux and Veronique Gauthier 2

November 1879 at St Marys Church Quyon, Que. Celina died the 25 Aug 1893 at Arnprior Ont and was buried 26 Aug 1893 at Arnprior. Edouard and Celina had 2 children.

Edouard next married 2) Catherine Bridget McGale 03 April 1894 in Ste Cecile de Masham Que. She was the daughter of Michael McGale and Ann Roach. Edouard and Catherine had 8 children
